option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="io.github.ronaldobattisti.desktop.controllers.OrdersPaneController" fx:id="root"> <!-- ...existing code... --> <ToolBar> <Label text="Pedidos"/> <Pane HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/> <TextField fx:id="searchField" promptText="Pesquisar..."/> <Button text="Atualizar" fx:id="refreshButton"/> </ToolBar>
<!-- Tabela principal --> <TableView fx:id="ordersTable" prefHeight="350" prefWidth="800" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <columns> <TableColumn fx:id="orderIdColumn" text="ID" prefWidth="80"/> <TableColumn fx:id="orderDateColumn" text="Data" prefWidth="140"/> <TableColumn fx:id="orderAmountColumn" text="Total" prefWidth="120"/> <TableColumn fx:id="paymentStatusColumn" text="Status" prefWidth="120"/> </columns>
<!-- Placeholder quando vazio --> <placeholder> <Label text="Nenhum pedido encontrado."/> </placeholder> </TableView>
<!-- Rodapé simples (opcional) --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" spacing="8"> <Label text="Total de linhas:"/> <Label fx:id="rowsCountLabel" text="0"/> </HBox> </VBox>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="io.github.ronaldobattisti.desktop.controllers.OrdersPaneController" fx:id="root"> <!-- ...existing code... --> <ToolBar> <!-- Adicionado fx:id para poder injetar no controller --> <Label fx:id="welcomeLabel" text="Pedidos"/> <Pane HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/> <TextField fx:id="searchField" promptText="Pesquisar..."/> <Button text="Atualizar" fx:id="refreshButton"/> </ToolBar>
<!-- Tabela principal --> <TableView fx:id="ordersTable" prefHeight="350" prefWidth="800" VBox.vgrow="ALWAYS"> <columns> <TableColumn fx:id="orderIdColumn" text="ID" prefWidth="80"/> <TableColumn fx:id="orderDateColumn" text="Data" prefWidth="140"/> <TableColumn fx:id="orderAmountColumn" text="Total" prefWidth="120"/> <TableColumn fx:id="paymentStatusColumn" text="Status" prefWidth="120"/> </columns>
<!-- Placeholder quando vazio --> <placeholder> <Label text="Nenhum pedido encontrado."/> </placeholder> </TableView>
<!-- Rodapé simples (opcional) --> <HBox alignment="CENTER_RIGHT" spacing="8"> <Label text="Total de linhas:"/> <Label fx:id="rowsCountLabel" text="0"/> </HBox> </VBox>
